summary: This document is an invoice from AT&T Wireless detailing the monthly charges for a specific account. It includes a summary of previous balances, payments received, current monthly charges, and various service fees. The document emphasizes the importance of timely payments and provides information on service adjustments and taxes. This document contains detailed records of voice usage and call activity associated with an AT&T Wireless account. It includes timestamps, call durations, and locations for incoming and outgoing calls, primarily from Palm Beach, Florida. The data may be relevant for tracking communications related to the Epstein case. This document contains detailed records of voice and text message usage for an AT&T Wireless account, including dates, times, and charges associated with incoming and outgoing calls and messages. It provides insight into communication patterns relevant to the Epstein case.
keyFacts: The total current monthly charges due upon receipt amount to $60.11.
The document includes a summary of previous balance adjustments totaling -$89.44.
There are various service charges and taxes listed, including a federal tax and local service taxes.
The document mentions a recurring electronic fund transfer (REFT) option for automatic payments.
The document details voice usage for an AT&T Wireless account, including numerous calls made and received in late December 2003 and early January 2004.
Calls are primarily logged from locations in Palm Beach and surrounding areas.
The records include various call types such as incoming, outgoing, and call waiting.
The document indicates multiple instances of unlimited airtime minutes for calls made during the specified period.
There are references to message retrieval events, suggesting the account may have been used for significant communications.
The document details voice usage for an AT&T Wireless account, including numerous incoming and outgoing calls.
Calls were made primarily from Palm Beach, FL, with some calls to New York, NY.
The account shows a total charge of $92.40 for the recorded usage.
Text messages were sent on multiple occasions, with a total charge of $0.80 for the messages.
The document is marked as confidential and includes multiple pages of detailed call and message logs.
